title: Mobile App Template For Blockchain
description: Many great projects are inaccessible via native mobile clients. We'd create iOS/iPad and android frontend clients for use by other projects.
solution: We partner with existing dapp developers for Cardano to integrate rich native iOS and android mobile client access to increase accessibility
experience: Successfully shipped 2 cross platform apps built from scratch in the last 2 years, one in the financial sector and one in the health sector.
